about_the_game:
Overview:

Monster House Racing invites you to rev your engines and speed through the haunted corridors of the Grindstone Manor in this exhilarating VR kart racing game. Embrace the Halloween spirit as you compete against friends and AI opponents in thrilling races across ghostly tracks filled with supernatural challenges and spooky surprises. Whether you're a seasoned racer or new to the track, Monster House Racing offers a heart-pounding experience perfect for any fan of high-speed action and haunted thrills.

Game Description:

Prepare yourself for a kart racing adventure, where the eerie meets the exhilarating. Set in the shadowy and mysterious Grindstone Manor, Monster House Racing challenges players to navigate eight unique tracks teeming with haunted obstacles and eerie environments. Choose from a cast of quirky, Halloween-themed characters and karts, each with unique abilities to help you gain an edge on the track. With support for up to three racers per match, this social VR experience lets you immerse yourself in the fun with friends or solo against AI opponents.

Designed for PSVR2, Quest, and PCVR, Monster House Racing delivers an immersive racing experience where strategy, speed, and spooky fun collide. Dive into the first-person view for a truly immersive ride or switch to the third-person perspective for a wider view of the competition. With a range of power-ups, traps, and the ability to block opponents strategically, every race is a thrilling test of reflexes and wits.

Whether you’re hosting a game night, seeking solo challenges, or looking for a competitive edge, Monster House Racing is your ticket to Halloween fun all year round. Are you ready to race through fear and conquer the haunted tracks?

Key Features:

Spooky Setting: Race through the haunted halls, dungeons, and graveyards of Grindstone Manor, each track brimming with eerie ambience and supernatural surprises.

Unique Characters & Karts: Choose from a lineup of spooky characters and themed karts, each offering unique abilities and attributes to enhance your racing strategy.

VR and Multiplayer Fun: Dive into the immersive world with PSVR2. Race with friends in local mode, or compete against AI bots that vary in difficulty.

Strategic Gameplay: Utilise an array of Halloween-inspired power-ups and traps to outmaneuver and outsmart your opponents.

Versatile Racing Experience: Switch between first-person and third-person views to suit your racing style and gain a strategic edge.

Whimsical Aesthetics: Enjoy the charming cartoon-style visuals with toon-shading for a playful yet immersive racing experience.

Chilling Audio: Experience dynamic soundscapes and immersive audio that enhance the spooky atmosphere and high-octane action.

Get ready to put the pedal to the metal and embrace the frightful fun of Monster House Racing VR. Can you handle the haunted tracks and emerge as the ultimate racer?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or Ryzen 5 3000
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia GTX 1080 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Any OpenXR compatible VR headset and controllers. Supports standing/seated and room scale play areas.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 or Ryzen 5 5000
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia GTX 2080 or better
  • VR Support: Any OpenXR compatible VR headset and controllers. Supports standing/seated and room scale play areas.

short_description: Race through haunted tracks in Monster House Racing! Choose spooky characters, wield power-ups, and outmaneuver friends or AI in this thrilling VR kart racer. Available on PSVR2, Quest, and PCVR, experience the eerie excitement of Grindstone Manor this Halloween!
